entity.name: OpenRefine
entity.description: OpenRefine is a free, powerful tool for working with messy data and improving it. Our mission is to empower everyone to meaningfully engage with data by providing an accessible open source tool and nurturing a diverse, supportive community. OpenRefine is a fiscally sponsored project of Code for Science & Society, a 501(c)(3) charitable organization in the USA. Donations are tax-deductible to the extent allowed by US law (Tax ID: 81-3791683).

projects.name: OpenRefine
projects.description: We are funded by grants and gifts from institutions and individuals like you. Our annual operating budget is US$140 000 (or appx US$11,500 per month) to support our core team for maintenance, coordination, licensing, and administration. Details on fund usage and other sources of funding are available on our funding page (https://openrefine.org/funding). We would like to thanks our current donors (https://openrefine.org/backers).

plans.name: $5/month - Sustainer Level
plans.description: Contribute toward maintaining the OpenRefine infrastructure

plans.name: $10/month - Sustainer Plus Level
plans.description: Contribute toward maintaining the OpenRefine infrastructure

plans.name: $25/month - Sponsor Level
plans.description: Fund our Figma license for one month

plans.name: $50/month - Infrastructure Sponsor Level
plans.description: Fund our forum hosting for one month

plans.name: $100/month - Benefactor Level
plans.description: Pay for third-party tools and services for one month

plans.name: $500/month - Advocate Level
plans.description: Help us attend a conference to promote OpenRefine

plans.name: $1,000/month - Advocate Plus Level
plans.description: Help us attend two conferences to promote OpenRefine

plans.name: $2,500/month - Partner Level
plans.description: Support our core team for one week

plans.name: $5,000/month - Patron Level
plans.description: Support our core team for two weeks

plans.name: $10,000/month - Champion Level
plans.description: Sponsor the entire team for one month
